DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study compare effect duration Neuromuscular Electrical Elongation ( NMEE ) technique versus PNF technique versus control group , extensibility hamstring muscle . Hypothesis : NMEE shorten hamstring muscle healthy subject , compare PNF control group produce significant increase hamstring extensibility .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Two Stretching Techniques Healthy Volunteers With Shortened Hamstrings
DOC.detailed_description: It double-blinded randomized clinical trial subject healthy volunteer city Zaragoza old 18 year . All subject injury free time study must history knee hip surgery . They must physically active , without engage competition-level sport , must flexibility deficit , measure AKE test position SLK test position ( < 60º AKE ; < 80º SLK ) . There NMEE Group ( Neuromuscular Electrical Elongation ) , PNF Group ( Proprioceptive Neuromuscular Facilitation ) Control Group ( No Invervention ) . Intervention : NMEE technique perform stretch muscle till resistance apply bipolar interferential current produce involuntary contraction muscle maintain 3 second . After , subject contract antagonist muscle ( quadriceps ) actively feels resistance . Then , intensity electrical current increase . This cycle repeat 4 time . PNF technique perform stretch muscle till resistance felt . Then patient make isometric contraction muscle ( resistance ) 3 second . After , subject contract antagonist muscle ( quadriceps ) actively feels resistance . This contract-stretch cycle repeat 4 time . Control group : This group receive training program . In case shortening , assign intervention perform value consider normal maximum 8 stretch session ( 2 per week ) . Otherwise , shorten , intervention end moment . Assessment : To assess effectiveness techniques several test perform subject . For hamstrings extensibility : - Active-Knee-Extension Test ( AKE ) result bring information knee extension range motion . - Straight-Leg-Raise Test ( SLR ) result bring information hip flexion range motion . For quadriceps extensibility : - Goniometric measure knee flexion . - Distance heel gluteus use tape measure . Viscoelasticity property hamstring quadriceps muscle : - Myotonometric measurement use myotonometer obtain frequency , decrement ( elasticity ) stiffness . For neural assessment : - The Slump Test neural tension test use detect alter neurodynamics neural tissue sensitivity .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers Older 18 year Bilateral shorten hamstring muscle knee extension 60º ( TEAR , Neto et al. , 2015 ) ROM 80º hip ( straight leg raise test angle , EspejoAntúnez et al. , 2015 ) Participation muscular stretch program study Previous history surgical intervention hip , tight knee Muscleskeletal pain injury low back inferior limb Abdominal spine surgery within three month study begin . Exit Criteria : Patient´s petition Change regular physical activity level study period Appearance injury would contraindicate use stretch technique
